abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Structural Adjustment Loan
            Project supports the Government's structural adjustment
            program. The main areas covered by the Government's
            medium-term program include measures to: (a) improve
            incentives to stimulate private savings and investment in
            export oriented activities; (b) increase public savings and
            the efficiency of the public sector; (c) improve the
            commercial bank's mobilization and allocation of
            resources; and (iv) improve the productivity of the private
            agricultural sector.
